official_title: A bill to amend the Act providing for the incorporation of certain persons as Group Hospitalization, Inc.

summary.text: Amends Federal law granting a Federal charter to Group Hospitalization, Inc. to change the name of the corporation to Blue Cross and Blue Shield of the National Capital Area. Allows the corporation to engage in any lawful business that is incidental to or supportive of its affairs. Declares that the number of trustees, their terms of office, and their manner of election shall be fixed by the bylaws. Makes the corporation liable for taxes on unemployment compensation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act providing for the incorporation of certain persons as Group Hospitalization, Inc.
